homepage.title: India ⇄ Korea Cultural Bridge
homepage.value_text: Users can understand the cultures and languages of other countries.
mission_points: Provide key tourist spots and simple local expressions.
Explain cultural taboos to avoid misunderstandings.
Offer a platform for sharing photos, videos, and chatting.
Enable real-time chat and video calls for communication.
homepage.features_subtitle: Building trust through knowledge and authentic connections
homepage.comprehensive_text: Detailed guides covering all aspects of cultural exchange
homepage.safe_text: Verified profiles and moderated community interactions
homepage.authentic_text: Real insights from cultural experts and community members
